mapper.sql: ID, CPA_NAME, CPA_MANAGER, OPER_USER, `STATUS`, BIZ_TYPE, UPDATE_TIME, CPA_MANAGER_NAME, OLD_MOPAN_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into adv_info
ID,
CPA_NAME,
CPA_MANAGER,
OPER_USER,
`STATUS`,
BIZ_TYPE,
UPDATE_TIME,
CPA_MANAGER_NAME,
OLD_MOPAN_ID,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cpaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cpaManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{cpaManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{oldMopanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update adv_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CPA_NAME = #{record.cpaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPA_MANAGER = #{record.cpaManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPER_USER = #{record.operUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`STATUS` = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIZ_TYPE = #{record.bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CPA_MANAGER_NAME = #{record.cpaManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_MOPAN_ID = #{record.oldMopanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update adv_info set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CPA_NAME = #{record.cpaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CPA_MANAGER = #{record.cpaManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPER_USER = #{record.operUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `STATUS` = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIZ_TYPE = #{record.bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CPA_MANAGER_NAME = #{record.cpaManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_MOPAN_ID = #{record.oldMopanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update adv_info
CPA_NAME = #{cpaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPA_MANAGER = #{cpaManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPER_USER = #{operUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIZ_TYPE = #{bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CPA_MANAGER_NAME = #{cpaManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_MOPAN_ID = #{oldMopanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update adv_info set CPA_NAME = #{cpaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CPA_MANAGER = #{cpaManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPER_USER = #{operUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIZ_TYPE = #{bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CPA_MANAGER_NAME = #{cpaManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_MOPAN_ID = #{oldMopanId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT d.`id`, d.cpaname, d.cpastatus, d.platformId, ( CASE d.oldmopanid WHEN 0 THEN d.ID ELSE d.oldmopanid END ) AS oldmopanid, d.adsstatus, c.ADS_CATEGORY_ID, d.adsid FROM ( SELECT a.ID AS `id`, a.CPA_NAME AS cpaname, a.`STATUS` AS cpastatus, a.OLD_MOPAN_ID AS oldmopanid, b.`STATUS` AS adsstatus, b.`ID` AS adsid, b.PLATFORM_ID AS platformId FROM adv_info a LEFT JOIN ads_info b ON a.ID = b.ADV_INFO_ID WHERE 1=1
AND a.BIZ_TYPE = #{biz_type}
AND b.PLATFORM_ID = #{platform_id}
AND a.`STATUS` =1 AND b.`STATUS` =2
AND a.`STATUS` =1 AND b.`STATUS` =1
AND a.`STATUS` =1 AND b.`STATUS` in (3,4)
AND (a.`STATUS` =2 OR b.`STATUS` =5)
AND a.`STATUS` =4
AND a.`STATUS` =5
AND a.`STATUS` =6
AND (a.`STATUS` =5 or a.`STATUS` =6)
AND a.CPA_NAME LIKE concat_ws('','%',#{param},'%') ORDER BY a.UPDATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{limitstart},#{limitend} ) d LEFT JOIN link_ads_info_category c ON d.adsid = c.ADS_INFO_ID

SELECT COUNT(a.ID) FROM adv_info a LEFT JOIN ads_info b ON a.ID = b.ADV_INFO_ID WHERE a.BIZ_TYPE = #{biz_type} AND b.PLATFORM_ID = #{platform_id}
AND a.`STATUS` =1 AND b.`STATUS` =2
AND a.`STATUS` =1 AND b.`STATUS` =1
AND a.`STATUS` =1 AND b.`STATUS` in (3,4)
AND (a.`STATUS` =2 OR b.`STATUS` =5)
AND a.`STATUS` =4
AND a.`STATUS` =5
AND a.`STATUS` =6
AND (a.`STATUS` =5 or a.`STATUS` =6)
AND a.CPA_NAME LIKE concat_ws('','%',#{param},'%')

SELECT a.ID AS `id`, a.CPA_NAME AS cpaname, a.CPA_MANAGER AS cpamanager, a.CPA_MANAGER_NAME AS cpaManagerName, a.OPER_USER AS operuser, a.OLD_MOPAN_ID AS oldmopanid, a.`STATUS` AS cpastatus,
b.`ID` AS adsid, b.ADS_NAME AS adsname, b.`STATUS` AS adsstatus, b.ADV_INFO_ID AS advInfoId, b.PLATFORM_ID AS platformId, b.`SORT` AS sort ,c.ADS_CATEGORY_ID , d.IDEA_ID as ideaId, d.IDEA_NAME as ideaName, d.IDEA_URL as ideaUrl, d.PACKAGE_NAME as packageName, d.FEE_TYPE_ID as feeTypeId, d.ADS_INFO_ID as adsInfoId, d.ADS_TYPE_ID as adsTypeId, d.IDEA_STATUS as ideaStatus, d.ADS_PRICE as adsPrice, d.TEMPLATE_ID as templateId,
e.IDEA_ID as ideaId_c, e.IDEA_NAME as ideaName_c, e.IDEA_URL as ideaUrl_c, e.PACKAGE_NAME as packageName_c, e.FEE_TYPE_ID as feeTypeId_c, e.ADS_INFO_ID as adsInfoId_c, e.ADS_TYPE_ID as adsTypeId_c, e.IDEA_STATUS as ideaStatus_c, e.ADS_PRICE as adsPrice_c, e.TEMPLATE_ID as templateId_c,
f.IDEA_SOURCE_ID as ideaSourceId, f.REF_IDEA_ID AS refIdeaId, f.REC_URL as recUrl, f.WIDTH as width, f.HEIGHT as height, f.VIEW_TYPE as viewType, f.SOURCE_TYPE as sourceType,
g.IDEA_SOURCE_ID as ideaSourceId_c, g.REF_IDEA_ID AS refIdeaId_c, g.REC_URL as recUrl_c, g.WIDTH as width_c, g.HEIGHT as height_c, g.VIEW_TYPE as viewType_c, g.SOURCE_TYPE as sourceType_c
FROM (select * from adv_info z where z.ID = #{0} ) a LEFT JOIN ads_info b ON a.ID = b.ADV_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN link_ads_info_category c on b.ID=c.ADS_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN ads_idea d on b.ID=d.ADS_INFO_ID and d.ADS_TYPE_ID='1' and d.IDEA_STATUS!=-1 LEFT JOIN ads_idea_source f ON d.IDEA_ID=f.REF_IDEA_ID and f.SOURCE_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN ads_idea e on b.ID=e.ADS_INFO_ID and e.ADS_TYPE_ID='2' and e.IDEA_STATUS!=-1 LEFT JOIN ads_idea_source g ON e.IDEA_ID=g.REF_IDEA_ID and g.SOURCE_TYPE=1
SELECT ID FROM adv_info WHERE CPA_MANAGER = #{0}
